name: AdMob
description: AdMob built a pay-per click marketplace for mobile apps. Now part of Google, AdMob continues to help businesses gain user insights and drive in-app purchases.

name: Alkira
description: Alkira equips its users with the first on-demand, multi-cloud network. Akira’s solution allows customers to build and deploy global secure cloud networks in minutes.

name: BigPanda
description: BigPanda improves how IT teams manage data. It analyzes IT alerts from fragmented clouds, applications and systems, and turns them into actionable insights.

name: Bird
description: Bird is an electric vehicle maker and bike-sharing network focused on sustainability. Its products make cities more livable by reducing car usage, traffic and carbon emissions.

name: BridgeBio
description: BridgeBio develops breakthrough medicines for genetic diseases. Its portfolio of more than 15 drugs, all in various stages of development, addresses everything from genetic skin, cancer- and heart-related issues to renal disease.

name: Dolls Kill
description: Dolls Kill is a global fashion brand championing radically unapologetic self-expression. By curating the most unique assortment of brands across a range of looks, Dolls Kill is building a platform to empower the next generation.

name: GenEdit
description: GenEdit wants to transform the delivery of gene therapies for the next generation of non-viral, gene editing-based therapeutics. GenEdit’s technology platform solves delivery challenges by systematically screening its proprietary nanoparticle library and providing safe, efficient delivery to target tissues. Its proprietary nanoparticles have broad applications, from CRISPR-based therapeutics to gene therapy products.

name: Graphiant
description: Graphiant is creating a new model for connectivity in a rapidly changing world.

name: Green Dot
description: Green Dot is a financial technology and bank holding company. Through its retail and direct bank, Green Dot offers a suite of financial products for consumers and businesses that includes credit cards, payroll cards and money processing.

name: Houzz
description: Houzz is a marketplace for homeowners and home professionals. It’s where homeowners get ideas for their projects, buy products from vendors, and find the help they need to bring their vision to life.

name: KAYAK
description: By consolidating search functions for hundreds of travel companies, KAYAK became a one-stop shop for plane tickets, hotels, cars and travel packages. Its app solves a number of travel logistic issues on several platforms with the goal of improving travel.

name: LinkedIn
description: In 2003, LinkedIn launched the social network for professionals. Today LinkedIn, which is now part of Microsoft, helps hundreds of millions of users worldwide become more productive and successful.

name: NetApp
description: NetApp is a cloud storage and network data management company. It specializes in storage efficiency and makes information management easier. NetApp connects users’ cloud to on-prem, maximizes security and optimizes application performance.

name: Otter
description: Otter connects parents who need childcare with stay-at-home parents who can watch their kids. Its goal is for every child to have access to safe, high-quality childcare and for every stay-at-home parent to be economically empowered in a way that has never been possible.

name: Oracle
description: For decades, Oracle has engineered integrated hardware and software systems for some of the largest companies in the world. Oracle optimizes cloud monitoring and storage, develops databases and enterprises, and provides complementary services for cloud and real-world data centers.

name: Oso
description: Oso puts security in the hands of the makers by presenting security as code. It gives developers a library for authorization, with the freedom to shape and extend it as their needs evolve. By offloading this mental work, developers all over the world can shift their focus to moving fast.

name: OpenDNS
description: OpenDNS is a suite of consumer products aimed at making the internet faster, safer and more reliable. Providing a layer of protection on and off a company’s network, it prevents malicious attacks over any port or protocol. OpenDNS easy to deploy without any hardware, software or manual updates. The company is now part of Cisco.

name: Rappi
description: Rappi is an on-demand delivery platform for Latin America. It delivers everything from groceries to bandages in minutes.

name: Productboard
description: Productboard is a product management system helping organizations build the right products. It helps product managers learn what customers need, prioritize what to build next, and rally everyone around the roadmap.

name: Remote
description: Remote helps companies of all sizes employ top talent around the world with international payroll, benefits, taxes, compliance and more.

name: Security Scorecard
description: Security Scorecard is the global leader in cybersecurity rankings. Its patented technology makes organizations more resilient with self-monitoring, third-party risk management, board reporting and cyber insurance underwriting.

name: StarkWare
description: StarkWare brings scalability and privacy to blockchains with zero-knowledge STARK proofs. It is a permissionless, decentralized ZK-Rollup operating as an L2 network over Ethereum. And it achieves scale while preserving the security of L1 Ethereum by producing STARK proofs off-chain and verifying those proofs on-chain.

name: Sumo Logic
description: Sumo Logic brings together data to put the power of machine data and analytics in everyone’s hands. It enables universal access and leverages cloud economics from a single cloud-native continuous intelligence platform.

name: The Org
description: The Org is an online professional community platform. It helps organizations get more exposure externally and operate more efficiently internally.

name: Tourlane
description: Tourlane connects travelers with handpicked travel experts to organize authentic customized experiences, from safaris in Tanzania to diving in the Galápagos Islands.

name: Thumbtack
description: Thumbtack helps people care for their homes from top to bottom, whether it’s a minor repair or a major remodel. Its home management platform connects customers to the right professionals for projects, empowering them to fix, maintain and improve their most valuable asset.

name: Truework
description: Truework is building a network for verified identity that puts consumers in control of their sensitive personal information. Truework’s platform digitizes employment verification processes for HR departments, banks and others to make verification faster and more secure.

name: Trulia
description: Trulia is an all-in-one real estate site. It gives the local scoop on homes for sale, apartments for rent, neighborhood insights, real estate markets and trends. It also helps visitors decide what, where and when to buy, sell or rent. Trulia was acquired by Zillow in 2014.

name: Tumblr
description: Tumblr is a short-form, mixed-media blogging platform focused on visuals and multimedia. Acquired by Yahoo in 2013, Tumblr attracts hundreds of millions of unique visitors who follow hundreds of millions of blogs. The platform also offers ad purchases and blog themes for companies and users.

name: Versa Networks
description: Versa Networks enables service providers and large enterprises to build next-generation WAN and branch networks based on a broad set of virtualized network functions (VNFs). Versa’s VNF-based solutions eliminate costly and proprietary network hardware to increase service agility and significantly reduce total cost of ownership.

name: Xoom
description: Xoom is a global money transfer service that lets people send money quickly and cheaply from any web-enabled device. Recipients don’t need a bank account or internet connection, and senders can fund their transfer with a credit or debit card or bank account. Xoom was acquired by PayPal in 2015.

name: CaptivateIQ
description: CaptivateIQ helps enterprise companies make their sales commissions transparent. With CaptivateIQ, businesses can design and measure incentive plans so their teams feel more connected and motivated to work together.

name: PlanGrid
description: Plangrid’s software brings blueprints and construction plans to the cloud, doing away with physical markups. It gets contractors and architects on the same page for instantaneous collaboration. Plangrid is now part of Autodesk.

name: dbt Labs
description: dbt uses integrated analytics to help data teams work like software engineers to ship data faster. Users can work directly within their data warehouse to quickly produce trusted datasets for reporting, ML modeling and operational workflows.

name: Yahoo
description: Yahoo is a global media and tech company that connects people to their passions, from finance and sports to shopping, gaming and news. The company also provides a full-stack platform for businesses to amplify growth and drive meaningful connections across advertising, search and media.

name: Fireblocks
description: Fireblocks is an enterprise-grade platform with a secure infrastructure for moving, storing and issuing digital assets. It lets exchanges, custodians, banks, trading desks and hedge funds securely scale digital asset operations through the Fireblocks Network and MPC-based Wallet Infrastructure. Fireblocks’ insurance policy covers assets in storage and transit.

name: Stairwell
description: Stairwell is turning security inside out by leaving the world of passive alerts behind and looking inward at a company’s data. It provides an intelligent view of a company’s environment and enriches it with emerging threat intelligence to identify artifacts, patterns and relationships that indicate nefarious activity.

name: Infracost
description: Infracost helps engineering teams see how code changes affect their cloud costs. It scans a Terraform code and checks over 3 million prices to create a simple, understandable cost estimate before launch. Users can view helpful comments like: “This change will increase your AWS bill by 25%.”

name: Cellworks
description: Cellworks is a personalized medicine platform that uses AI to predict successful matches between patients and drug therapies, which are then clinically validated. This technology drives down costs and provides payors with transparency.

name: ThousandEyes
description: ThousandEyes is an internet performance and digital experience monitoring company that arms everyone—engineers, teams, developers and end users—with instant insights across all connected devices within an organization.

name: Doppler
description: Doppler is a central source of truth for env vars and secrets. It enables sharing of API keys, database urls and certs across users’ team and infra.

name: Evervault
description: Evervault is building the internet infrastructure for data privacy. Its simple, secure cloud infrastructure can be set up in minutes.

name: Filecoin
description: Filecoin is a decentralized storage network designed to store humanity’s most important information. The network verifies that data is stored securely through cryptographic proofs.

name: Faire
description: Faire uses data and machine learning to connect entrepreneurs worldwide. Its online wholesale marketplaces level the playing field so small businesses can compete with the retail giants.

name: Clever
description: Clever simplifies educational technology for teachers and students. Its platform puts every application in one place, charging app developers, not schools, for the service.

name: RingCentral
description: RingCentral is a global provider of cloud enterprise unified communications and collaboration solutions. It allows mobile and distributed workforces to be connected anywhere and on any device through voice, video, team messaging, collaboration, SMS, conferencing, online meetings, contact center and fax.

name: Barracuda
description: Barracuda provides email protection, application and cloud security, network security and data protection solutions.

name: FireEye
description: FireEye brought a fresh perspective to network security when it launched in 2004. Today FireEye’s virtual machine-based security platform protects countless Fortune 500 companies and governments worldwide against cyberattacks and malware.

name: Guardant Health
description: Guardant Health is a leading oncology company focused on conquering cancer worldwide. Its proprietary blood tests, vast data sets and advanced analytics help drive commercial adoption, improve patient outcomes and lower healthcare costs at every stage of the treatment journey.

name: Medallia
description: Medallia captures signals from face-to-face, digital and IoT interactions. It applies proprietary AI technology to get personalized and predictive insights that drive tremendous results. Using Medallia Experience Cloud, customers reduce churn, turn detractors into buyers, and find cross-sell and upsell opportunities with clear ROI.

name: Nimble Storage
description: Nimble Storage is an enterprise storage platform using AI to provide faster storage with better capacity utilization. It is now part of Hewlett-Packard Enterprise.

name: Amplitude
description: Amplitude helps companies optimize the business value of digital product innovation. Its Behavioral Graph is the largest database of customer behavior and the industry’s first Digital Optimization System.

name: Confluent
description: Founded by the Apache Kafka team at LinkedIn, Confluent is a streaming data platform that helps companies access enterprise data in real time.

name: Armis
description: Armis is the first agentless, enterprise-class security platform for unmanaged and IoT devices. With Armis, companies can adopt new connected devices without fear of comprise.

name: Bolt
description: Bolt is a European mobility platform that makes urban travel more affordable and sustainable. Services include ridesharing, scooter rentals and food delivery.

name: Island
description: With the core needs of the enterprise naturally embedded in the browser itself, the Island Enterprise Browser gives organizations complete control, visibility, and governance over the last mile, while delivering the same Chromium-based browser experience users expect. Island is redefining the future of work for some of the largest, most respected enterprises in the world.

name: Cyera
description: Cyera gives organizations instant Data Reality, taking the guesswork out of cloud data security. It enables security teams to have a complete, current, and correct picture of their data reality across all clouds and datastores. Running out-of-band and without agents, Cyera instantly provides companies a strong baseline for all security, risk management, and compliance efforts and ensures the entire organization operates with the same policies and guardrails.

name: Wonolo
description: Wonolo is an on-demand staffing platform redefining the way businesses find talent for their immediate labor needs. Wonolo provides a broad range of jobs, from warehouse, delivery and merchandising to event staffing and admin.

name: Pendulum
description: Pendulum develops novel interventions that target the human microbiome to improve the lives of patients suffering from a variety of diseases. Its targeted formulations, made with natural bacterial strains, help rebalance the microbiome, which restores people’s health.

name: Maven
description: Maven is the largest virtual clinic for women and family health that provides holistic care. Maven’s platform cuts costs and drives better health outcomes for parents and children alike.

name: Prelude
description: Prelude is a technology company that hardens cybersecurity defenses. Organizations of all sizes can use our tools to run continuous security tests against their systems to discover areas of weakness to fix. We do that in a way that’s safe, transparent, and integrated with existing defensive tools to allow organizations to get ahead of real incidents before they happen.

name: Qualtrics
description: Qualtrics is a single system of record for all experience data. Initially created to run surveys in the cloud, today Qualtrics allows organizations to manage the four core experiences of business—customer, product, employee and brand experiences—on one platform.
why_partnered: When we first came across Qualtrics, it could be described in one line as “SurveyMonkey on steroids.” Scott Smith, his two sons and a college roommate had built a user-friendly, flexible and robust survey engine with incredible retention rates. But it was their vision and ambition to create a new category for business, Experience Management (XM), that resonated even more. We were in.

name: WhatsApp
description: WhatsApp is an end-to-end encrypted mobile messaging app that lets users send messages free of charge. Acquired by Facebook in 2014, more than 2 billion people in over 180 countries now use WhatsApp to stay in touch.
why_partnered: We believed there was an opportunity for an independent, mobile-focused upstart to challenge the status quo of SMS messaging on the back of rising smartphone adoption. Jan and Brian had built WhatsApp to be a clean, no-nonsense messaging platform. Loved by those who adopted it, we were astonished by how rapidly it scaled with no marketing spend. It was simple and it worked.

name: Instagram
description: Instagram changed the way we share photos and video with mobile devices. It enables anyone to connect with more people, build a following and create compelling content that’s distinctly their own. Instagram is now part of Meta.
why_partnered: In 2012, smartphones were fast supplanting cameras as the primary way to capture photos. But sharing photos was difficult—they took forever to upload and picture quality was only so-so. Kevin offered a fast, beautiful and fun way to share your life with friends. That combined with rapid user growth and engagement led us to believe Instagram had the potential to build a powerful social graph to rival those that already existed.

name: Apple
description: Apple revolutionized personal technology with the Macintosh in 1984. It has repeatedly transformed the way humans interact with computers with the iPhone, iPod, MacBook, iMac and other products. Today it is the largest publicly traded company and one of the world’s most recognizable brands. Its forays into the worlds of cloud storage, wearables, music streaming and electric vehicles have proven the company continues to innovate.
why_partnered: Forty years ago, the concept of a “personal computer” didn’t exist. We backed Steve on the idea of Apple producing a consumer-centric product at an affordable price. Since then, Apple’s products have brought computing into the home, and out into the world, contributing to the disruption of nearly every industry.

name: Zoom
description: Zoom provides cloud video conferencing, online meetings, group messaging and a software-defined conference room on one easy-to-use platform. Its product brings teams together so they can connect to others and build toward a future limited only by their imagination.

name: The Boring Company
description: The Boring Company (TBC) was founded by Elon Musk to revolutionize transportation. Its mission is to solve traffic, beautify cities & expand rapid point-to-point transportation by creating safe, fast-to-dig, and low-cost transportation, utility, and freight tunnels. TBC has spent 5 years building core technologies designed to solve traffic and beautify cities via Loop and Hyperloop.

name: Zappos
description: Zappos is an online shoe, handbag, clothing and accessory retailer driven by exceptional customer service. The company carries thousands of footwear products and was the pioneer of free return shipping. Zappos is now part of Amazon.

name: Fides
description: Fides is the first ever Management Governance Platform (MGP) enabling companies to globally monitor, execute and automate their corporate governance duties. On one hand, Fides acts as the single-source-of-truth for all things entity and makes it easy to find key info per entity in a structured, actionable and visualised way. On top, Fides streamlines the execution of workflows for governance-related decisions, particularly through meetings, resolutions and approvals among the c-level suite. Fides customers benefit from reducing director’s liabilities, lower spend on legal resources, accelerated deal-readiness in DD and M&A processes as well as preventing governance scandals.

name: RevMap
description: The product sales feedback loop is broken in most companies, for cultural and operational reasons. RevMap bridges product and sales teams so companies can build better products, speed up product market fit and sell more efficiently. By unlocking valuable insights from sales, RevMap powers the best product and roadmap decisions, based on actionable customer and market feedback. We gamify and capture collaboration in Slack and other workflows, make product and roadmap insights easily discoverable for sales teams, and help companies reward product teams for their contribution to sales success.

name: Telescope
description: Telescope is an AI sales assistant that performs prospecting on auto-pilot. Telescope offers a revolutionary SaaS platform that performs B2B cold outreach on auto-pilot. By analysing billions of data points, it finds the right prospect for the right product at the right time and reaches out automatically with a personalised message. Using machine learning techniques, it quickly learns the user’s ideal client profile and becomes more intelligent over time. Telescope enables salespeople to spend less time prospecting for new clients, so they can instead focus on closing deals.

name: Meter
description: Meter’s full-stack approach to internet infrastructure combines hardware, software, and operations so that any company can easily set up and run a modern network. The goal is to make secure enterprise-grade networks more accessible, and to help innovative organizations get and stay online seamlessly. Our ambition is to turn Meter’s infrastructure into a turnkey utility––when a company moves into any commercial space, the internet and WiFi just works.

name: Pilot
description: Pilot is the largest provider of bookkeeping, tax preparation and CFO services for startups and small businesses. It combines intelligent software with world-class accountants to deliver quality books at an affordable price. Pilot automates the mundane work that’s not worth users’ valuable time.

name: Clipboard Health
description: Clipboard Health is an app-based talent marketplace that matches healthcare professionals with open shifts at healthcare facilities near them. Its mission is to lift as many people up the socioeconomic ladder as possible. Short-staffed healthcare facilities represent a long-term problem that became more acute with COVID-19, leading to increased burnout among nurses, less care and access to healthcare for patients, and skyrocketing costs for healthcare facilities.

name: Drift
description: Drift is the world’s leading conversational marketing platform. It combines chat, email, video and automation to remove friction from the buying experience. Customers use Drift to upgrade the buyer experience, generate more qualified leads, and dramatically accelerate the sales cycle.

name: Papaya
description: Papaya takes the pain out of paying bills. Its user-friendly app allows consumers to pay bills on mobile and integrates seamlessly with billers’ systems. The result is a better bill payment experience for everyone.

name: LayerZero
description: LayerZero is an omnichain interoperability protocol that allows dApps to build across multiple blockchains in a trustless, efficient manner. LayerZero connects dApps across chains using on-chain Ultra Light Nodes, which achieve the security of a light node with the cost-effectiveness of a middle-chain. Using the protocol, developers can turn their dapps into omnichain-applications using a single, simple interface.

name: Cohesity
description: Cohesity’s cloud-based platform makes it easy to back up, manage and extract value from enterprise data.

name: Glossier
description: Glossier is an online direct-to-consumer beauty brand. With products inspired by the people who use them and a mission to amplify their voices through beauty, Glossier celebrates individuality and personal choice.

name: Carbon
description: Carbon is transforming 3D printing through the process of light extrusion. This technology moves beyond basic prototyping to 3D to deliver materials faster than ever before.

name: Atari
description: Atari is the original video game pioneer. Its portfolio of more than 200 games includes hits like Asteroids, Centipede and Pong. Under its brand and franchises, Atari has expanded into the worlds of mobile gaming, merchandising and publishing.

name: Handshake
description: Handshake is a decentralized permissionless naming protocol where every peer is in charge of the root DNS zone. It aims to create an alternative to certificate authorities and naming systems.

name: JITX
description: Circuit boards are in every piece of electronics you have ever owned from your smartphone to your car, and are designed today by the determined efforts of expert electrical engineers. JITX lets these engineers write code to design circuit boards, bringing all the power of software development to hardware design.

name: Parallel
description: Parallel is an institutional-grade lending protocol for proof-of-stake blockchains. Parallel offers cross-chain money markets, leveraged staking, and zero collateral loans across blockchains.

name: Middesk
description: Middesk delivers business verifications, legal and regulatory checks, and industry classification products to businesses that work with businesses. With its modern compliance and risk tools, Middesk offers end-to-end solutions so companies can screen and monitor customers.

name: Protégé
description: On Protégé you can be heard and get discovered. Every industry has gatekeepers that hold the keys to the best opportunities. We believe that every person deserves a shot at proving themselves. For the first time, you can send a 60 second video to the best experts in the world and get a guaranteed video response and a shot at a life-changing opportunity.

name: Landis
description: Landis help renters become homeowners. Its algorithms can tell anyone what they need to buy a home. It helps clients find their dream home, rent it and purchase it when they’re ready to take on a mortgage.

name: Gather
description: Gather is building a social platform that fosters authentic connections. Its platform combines video chat with virtual spaces to make conversations more human.

name: LinkExchange
description: LinkExchange developed an internet advertising network for small businesses. It bartered ads and banner space with smaller sites and is now part of Microsoft.

name: Nimble Rx
description: Nimble RX is an online pharmacy that offers fast, easy and secure delivery. Nimble RX’s technology platform is the largest of its kind in the world.

name: Cribl
description: Founded by three ex-Splunkers on a mission to get the most out of machine data, Cribl helps customers easily sift through data to find the nuggets they need. Its innovative and customizable controls route security and machine data where it has the most value—and with a singular focus on assuring customers have complete control to shape their data. As data needs evolve, LogStream evolves too, helping to get the right data, to the right destinations, in the right formats, at the right time.

name: Found
description: Found gives self-employed people the support and confidence to work for themselves. It offers an all-in-one business banking, bookkeeping and tax solution for self-employed businesses.

name: Clari
description: Clari’s revenue operations platform uses AI to automatically harvest data from multiple enterprise systems across the entire revenue process, with the goal of creating transparency. Their end-to-end sales analytics and forecasting systems connect teams and make revenue more predictable.

name: Electronic Arts
description: Electronic Arts was a pioneer of the early home computer games industry. Now a global leader in interactive entertainment software, EA delivers games, content and online services for internet-connected consoles, personal computers, mobile phones and tablets. EA is best known for franchises like The Sims and Madden NFL.

name: Orbital Insight
description: Through a technique called deep learning, Orbital Insight harnesses and analyzes satellite imagery, creating opportunities for innovation in just about every sector, from agricultural development to deforestation policy.

name: Evernote
description: Evernote brings your life’s work together in one digital workspace. It makes it easy to capture and organize notes and collaborate in a single workspace.

name: Temporal Technologies
description: Temporal enables any software application to handle failures gracefully and in a user-friendly way. At its core, it is an open-source microservice orchestration platform for writing durable workflows as code. It makes it easier to develop reliable software for the cloud by offering an entirely new way to build scalable and reliable applications.

name: Caldera
description: Caldera specializes in building high-performance, customizable, and application-specific layer-two blockchains. These custom-built blockchains (Caldera Chains) offer high throughput, low latency, and customizable features for optimizing the performance and user experience of decentralized applications, with the ability to process hundreds of transactions per second and sub-second confirmation times.

name: Citadel Securities
description: Citadel Securities is a leading global market maker that provides both institutional and retail investors with the liquidity they need to execute transactions across a broad array of equity and fixed income products. The firm has been at the forefront of the modernization of markets and market structures, which has delivered enormous benefits to investors globally. The talent of its extraordinary market making team, combined with its powerful risk management techniques, advanced predictive analytics and superior software engineering have transformed the client experience in the many markets it serves.

name: FTX
description: FTX.COM is a cryptocurrency exchange. It offers derivatives, options and volatility products, tokenized stocks, prediction markets, leveraged tokens and an OTC desk.

name: Dashlane
description: Dashlane secures users’ digital identity across a wide range of platforms and devices. The Dashlane app automatically fills and stores passwords, personal data and payment details, and includes a suite of tools to help consumers protect their identity online.

name: Fintual
description: Fintual provides easy access to a balanced investment portfolio through its easy-to-use app. Launched in Chile in 2018, and Mexico in 2021, Fintual has a regulatory license that allows it to offer mostly global ETFs.

name: Statsig
description: Statsig powers A/B tests and experiments for web and mobile applications, automatically optimize app experiences with zero effort, and give a comprehensive view of what’s driving impact.

name: Rec Room
description: Rec Room is an AR and VR software company that makes it easy to chat, hang out and explore millions of player-created rooms. Think of it as a digital third place for kids at heart.

name: biomodal
description: biomodal is an omics based life-sciences technology and analytics company delivering products that bring the dynamism of our ever-changing biology into focus. Their duet multiomics solution enables more epigenetic information from a single, low input DNA library without complex, resource intensive bioinformatics or harsh chemical treatment. Their single-base-resolution, phased sequencing approach unlocks the combinatorial power of genetic and epigenetic information in one workflow, elucidating greater biological insight within the fields of cancer, neurodegenerative disease, and ageing.

name: Twain
description: Twain is an AI that increases the conversion rate of your outreach messages. Within seconds you will write a great opener, detect filler words, and learn how to craft call-to-actions that get answers.

name: Arcwise
description: Arcwise is a platform for analytical but non-technical business users to build, publish, and maintain data and ML applications, all from their spreadsheet. They’re building a collaborative workspace to bridge the gap between business operators and technical data experts — ”arcing” the divide between notebooks and spreadsheets. Arcwise is the missing tool that would have saved years of person-hours at Flexport, where business-critical data applications repeatedly took months to move from spreadsheets to Python.

name: Lilt
description: Lilt is the leading AI solution for enterprise translations. Their stack, made up of our Contextual AI Engine, Connector APIs, and Human Adaptive Feedback, enables global organizations to adopt a true AI translation strategy, focusing on business outcomes instead of outputs. With Lilt, innovative, category-defining organizations like Intel, ASICS, WalkMe, and Canva are using AI technology to deliver multilingual, digital customer experiences at scale.

name: PicsArt
description: Picsart is a free-to-use ecosystem of content, tools and inspiration. It has amassed one of the largest open-source content collections in the world, with free-to-edit photos, stickers, backgrounds and templates.

name: Sourcegraph
description: Sourcegraph is a universal code search tool. It helps developers find and fix things faster across all their code. Sourcegraph also searches every open-source repository so engineers can explore, learn and reference the best community-developed code out there.

name: Tecton
description: Tecton’s enterprise-ready feature store makes world-class machine learning accessible to every company. Its store helps ML teams serve great features quickly, reliably and at scale.

name: Verkada
description: Verkada is reinventing video security for the enterprise with a hybrid cloud security solution that makes it simple to manage devices at scale. Verkada’s solution offers the sharpness, modernity and user-friendliness of a consumer product.

name: Vise
description: Vise automates investment management with AI. Its full-stack platform spans the entire lifecycle of the advisor-client relationship, from customizing and managing client portfolios to providing ongoing intelligence. This frees up financial advisors to focus on what matters most: their client relationships.

name: Attentive
description: Attentive is a personalized text messaging platform for innovative brands. Using real-time behavioral data, Attentive automatically sends engaging text messages to each subscriber at every step of their customer journey.

name: Semgrep
description: Semgrep, formerly known as r2c, is a code scanning platform for finding first and third-party security vulnerabilities in your code base.

name: Rippling
description: Rippling is a human resource management company that manages employees’ payroll, benefits, devices, and apps. It automates manual work, like onboarding new hires.

name: Pace
description: Pace is where hundreds of small groups find human connection on the internet every week. Their mission is to unlock emotional connection together. They bring people together to work on their mental and emotional health, wherever they are.

name: Iron Fish
description: Iron Fish is a Layer 1 blockchain that provides the strongest privacy guarantees on every single transaction. Leveraging zero-knowledge proofs (zk-SNARKs) and the highest industry standards for encryption, Iron Fish delivers complete control over who sees transaction details via account view keys or transaction decryption keys.

name: Keen Technologies
description: Keen Technologies is John Carmack’s AGI effort.

name: Monad
description: Founded by security industry veterans and backed by world-class investors, Monad provides data infrastructure for the modern enterprise security data lake. It connects to the most important security tools, organizes data from those tools into a schema that fits analytics needs, and delivers it directly to data warehouses. Security teams use Monad to get a consolidated view of security data and to create sophisticated security analytics.

name: Magic Eden
description: Magic Eden is the leading destination for NFT discovery, expression, and ownership across digital cultures. Led by former crypto, tech, and hospitality leaders, Magic Eden is driving the next billion users to Web3 by providing a user-friendly platform equipped with powerful minting and trading solutions. Magic Eden brings dynamic cultural moments onto the blockchain, empowering users across thousands of communities to create and collect unique NFTs.

name: Flagship
description: Flagship enables creators to set up their own curated boutiques, without having to deal with inventory, customer service or sales tax. They partner with brands to power a large catalog that creators can curate from for their audience and earn a commission on every sale. When consumers discover and buy products from creator-owned stores, the platform automatically propagates the orders to partner brands and settles the payment between brands and creators. Flagship is setting a standard for a privacy-forward customer acquisition that is centered humans and entrepreneurs.

name: Census
description: Census takes models and insights from data warehouses to help go-to-market teams streamline their workflows.

name: Mutiny
description: Mutiny is a no-code AI platform helping marketers convert their top-of-funnel demand into revenue without engineers. It gives marketers what they need to drive revenue and prove it, from data and analytics to AI-powered recommendations.

name: xentral
description: xentral is a lean ERP cloud software that bundles all your business processes in one place, from e-commerce, warehouse and production to fulfillment and accounting. With more than 1,000 functions and interfaces, xentral allows every business to digitize and automate individual processes step-by-step.

name: SureIn
description: SureIn empowers SMBs to efficiently manage their risk and insurance. As an independent insurance platform, we keep track of the customer’s risk profile & insurance portfolio on an ongoing basis. Starting with the gastronomy vertical, SureIn tackles one vertical at a time to provide a best-in-class user centric product and service experience. We subsequently expand the proposition with the development of own and highly individualized insurance products, adding them into the mix of our all-in-one platform as well expanding vertically into adjacent industries.

name: Linear
description: Linear helps developers streamline software projects, sprints, tasks and bug tracking without hampering progress.
why_partnered: Linear’s ambition was to become the new standard for modern software development and project management—a Jira 2.0. Karri and his team’s understanding of the pain points experienced by engineers and PMs was apparent as was their ability to translate that into a product. The speed with which they moved and the early engagement they were able to drive gave us conviction that Linear could define the next generation of software development tools.

name: Snapdocs
description: Snapdocs is a real estate technology company modernizing the mortgage process for lenders, title and escrow companies as well as consumers.

name: Noom
description: Noom is the world’s leading behavior change company focused on disrupting the weight loss and healthcare industries. Combining the power of AI, mobile tech and psychology with empathetic personal coaches, Noom helps people live healthier lives by changing their long-term habits.

name: X
description: X (formerly Twitter) is a Sequoia-backed company since 2022.

name: Studeo
description: Studeo is on a mission to revolutionise education by digitalising and democratising elite tutoring. On its mission to revolutionise the way education is taught, Studeo hires the best and most passionate tutors and bring their knowledge into a video learning app accessible across the world at a fraction of the cost of private tutoring. Studeo exists to give 100% of students access to generally inaccessible resources. We aim to be the number one platform for students willing to learn faster and get the right tips to enter top universities.

name: Loom
description: Loom is a workplace collaboration tool focused on video. It delivers an effective way to communicate in the workplace with quick, instantly shareable videos that get the message across.Loom is now part of Atlassian.

name: Zum
description: Zūm is revolutionizing student transportation, enabling students to get to and from school safely, reliably and sustainably. Its technology platform provide real-time transparency to parents, schools and drivers, as well as route optimizations that save districts money and students time. Zūm is building the nation’s largest mass transit system, deploying EV fleets to reduce emissions, provide cleaner air for our children and deliver energy back to the grid.

name: Aurora
description: Aurora delivers the benefits of self-driving technology safely and efficiently. Aurora is solving today’s most complex AI, automation and engineering challenges to catalyze the self-driving revolution.

name: Commons
description: Commons is an app and community that offers practical guidance for sustainable living. With the app, anyone can track, reduce, and offset the emissions of everything they buy. Join a community of people shifting systems through our collective spending and choices.

name: Safara
description: Safara is a hotel booking app that provides you with trusted recommendations, saves you money, and reduces your climate footprint. The platform connects travelers with a highly-vetted list of curated hotels while also offering the flexibility to book and get 10% back at any of 500k+ properties worldwide.

name: Eventbrite
description: Eventbrite is a global self-service ticketing platform for live experiences. From music festivals and marathons to conferences and fundraisers, anyone can use the platform to discover enriching events.

name: Chkk
description: Chkk is a Kubernetes Availability Platform that identifies and prioritizes availability risks before they cause incidents, tracks artifacts and assets across the fleet, and creates pre-verified upgrade plans to remediate risks and speed up upgrades. Platform teams use Chkk to execute safe upgrades, remediate availability risks, monitor unsupported versions, and get visibility into what artifacts are running where. With Chkk, teams learn from others, don’t repeat mistakes, save time and effort, and get more done with fewer resources.

name: Blockaid
description: Blockaid provides security tools to web3 builders and protects users from scams, phishing, and hacks. Built by a team of engineers out of Israeli cyberintelligence, Blockaid is trusted by some of the biggest names in crypto.

name: Gladia
description: Powered by generative AI, Gladia is an audio intelligence API distinguished by exceptional accuracy and speed of transcription, extended multilingual capabilities, and state-of-the-art features, including speaker separation, word-level timestamps, and code-switching. It allows companies to easily embed language AI into their products to derive valuable insights from audio data.

name: Sunrun
description: Sunrun’s revolutionary solar power model allows people to use solar power without purchasing and maintaining panels. Sunrun provides planet-changing home solar in a simple, inexpensive and low-risk way.

name: Medallion
description: Medallion reduces healthcare paperwork with its all-in-one licensing, credentialing and payer enrollment platform. Its workflow automation streamlines back-office operations so providers can put the focus back to patients.

name: Stripe
description: Stripe is building an economic infrastructure for the internet. Businesses of every size, from new startups to public companies like Salesforce and Facebook, use the company’s software to accept online payments and run technically sophisticated financial operations in more than 100 countries.

name: Oasis Security
description: Oasis Security is the first enterprise platform for non-human identity management. The shift to hybrid multi-cloud, microservices, agile development and AI-driven business process automation has completely changed the identity fabric of enterprise environments. Oasis empowers security, engineering and developer teams to take control of the non-human identity lifecycle without risking system resilience and adding operational complexity.

name: Meeno
description: Meeno’s mission is to help people master the skill of social connection. Its mobile app harnesses AI to enhance all relationships: from friends to romance, from family to work.

name: Iambic Therapeutics
description: Iambic Therapeutics tackles challenging design problems in drug discovery with its physics-based AI platform. Its automated data pipelines help refine target profiles for drug candidates and enable high-throughput chemistry and biology to rapidly generate small-molecule therapeutics.

name: Iris Labs
description: Iris Labs is a trusted online community for beauty enthusiasts. The Iris app helps users share experiences, discover new trends and get personalized product recommendations.

name: Guided Energy
description: Guided Energy is an all-in-one EV fleet and energy management system. Leveraging AI and deep integrations across the EV ecosystem, the Guided platform gives customers an easier and cheaper way to deploy, charge and manage their electric fleet.

name: Visual Electric
description: Visual Electric is the first image generator designed for creatives—a canvas that facilitates the flow of ideas, so you can truly spread out and see where the tool takes you. It’s designed to help give form to the vision in your mind’s eye… or lead you to something even better.

name: Hallway
description: Avatars are virtual reflections of our true selves, allowing people to choose how they present themselves to the world. Hallway combines AI and ML with off-the-shelf hardware to empower 3D content and creativity for artists, fans, and creators. They believe this marriage between art and technology will enable an entirely new set of online experiences. They aim to radically democratize access to these tools and enable a customizable digital presence for a new generation of creators.

name: Gadget
description: Gadget is a serverless stack for ecommerce app developers. It connects to any ecommerce platform instantly, and enables developers to build apps in a fraction of the time by skipping the busywork.

name: strongDM
description: strongDM is an infrastructure access platform that connects any person or service to infrastructure. It gives technical staff frictionless and auditable access to everything they need across an entire stack.

name: Breeze.cash
description: Breeze.cash unlocks new revenue for businesses by helping them accept and manage crypto payments. With best-in-class compliance, accounting, analytics, and insights, Breeze brings the best of web2 into the world of web3.

name: Zipline
description: As the world’s leading on-demand drone delivery service, Zipline helps pioneering organizations transform how life moves. Zipline facilitates new models of care, extends reach and leverages data to continuously improve on-demand operation.

name: Quilt
description: Quilt’s AI Assistants solve some of the most important “jobs-to-be-done” for solutions organizations so solutions teams can spend more time with and be more effective partners to customers.

name: Open
description: Open (formerly Acelerate) is an online sales engine helps restaurants effortlessly increase their sales and profits.

name: Okta
description: Okta is the foundation for secure connections between people and technology. Harnessing the power of the cloud, it allows people to access applications on any device, at any time, while enforcing security protections. Okta integrates directly with an organization’s existing directories and identity systems.
why_partnered: Todd and Frederic were early evangelists of user-centric technology. With Okta, they built an easy-to-use identity solution for the enterprise. We were struck with their technical depth and their customer obsession. That combined with an inevitable market shift to cloud-centric identity and mobile adoption, gave us conviction that Okta would become the market leader in identity and access management.

name: Meraki
description: Meraki offered a complete system of networking products, doing away with market fragmentation so companies could leverage quality network connections. Now part of Cisco, Meraki still provides routing and security solutions for home and enterprise networks through its hardware and cloud-based solutions.

name: Elyn
description: Elyn provides a return management and exchange portal that helps brands optimize their online profitability.

name: Pocket Gems
description: Pocket Gems makes graphically rich mobile games and fun new genres of mobile entertainment.

name: Citizen
description: Citizen is a personal safety app and mobile protection service.

name: Watershed
description: Watershed is a software platform helping companies get to net zero carbon. Its platform equips customers to run a climate program the way they would their business: It analyzes a company’s full carbon footprint, including Scope 3 emissions; maps out a plan to get to net zero; funds carbon removal; and reports progress to stakeholders.

name: Neeva
description: Neeva is the world’s first completely ad-free private search engine. It helps users find exactly what matters to them, whether that information is on the web, in their buried emails or an impossible-to-find document. Neeva never shows distracting ads and keeps all searches private.

name: nxyz
description: nxyz indexes the blockchain and provides performant, real-time, flexible blockchain data APIs for web3 developers.

name: 100 Thieves
description: 100 Thieves is a lifestyle brand for gamers. It fields esports teams, hosts live events and produces themed apparel.

name: Cockroach Labs
description: Cockroach Labs provides a cloud-native, distributed SQL database for critical enterprise applications.

name: The Melt
description: The Melt is a California-based fast-casual restaurant chain.

name: Lugg
description: Lugg is an on-demand moving and storage company.

name: Piazza
description: Piazza is a social learning platform connecting students, instructors and employers.

name: Jasper
description: Jasper Technologies is a mobile data carrier service. Its SaaS IoT platform lets companies quickly launch, manage and monetize IoT services worldwide. Cisco acquired Jasper Technologies in 2016.

name: Cobot
description: Cobot is redefining the future of human-robot interaction by building practical cobots that have human-like capabilities.

name: Commure
description: Commure (FKA Athelas) is an AI-powered operating system for healthcare providers that connects data and workflows while boosting clinical and financial performance.

name: Summer Health
description: Now you have a doctor in your contacts. With a simple text message, get answers from expert, board-certified pediatricians in 15 minutes. Any time, day or night. Your doctor will provide personalized answers for questions ranging from your child’s health & development to postpartum care.

name: Brewbird
description: Brewbird provides coffee machines and sustainable whole-bean pods for the workplace.

name: Apex
description: Apex is a Security Platform for generative AI and LLMs that helps companies remediate AI risks from any source. Apex provides a robust foundation for companies to safely boost their business with AI.

name: Physical Intelligence
description: Physical Intelligence is building a foundation model for robotics, bringing general-purpose AI into the physical world.

name: Jive Software
description: Jive pioneered Social Business Software combining the power of social networking, collaboration and community.

name: SpaceX
description: SpaceX designs, manufactures and launches the world’s most advanced rockets and spacecraft. The company is revolutionizing space transportation and developing a low latency, broadband internet system to meet the needs of consumers across the globe.

name: Retool
description: Retool is the fastest way to build internal applications. Instead of coding from scratch, Retool equips developers with the building blocks they need to make the basics and code the rest.
why_partnered: The premise of Retool was simple, yet powerful. Internal tools were the largest category of software, and yet, despite innovation in nearly every other software sector, this was a space that had yet to benefit from a focus on design, user experience and the low-code movement. David Hsu deeply understood the pain engineers experienced building internal tools, and with Retool, set out to make it better. He helped us see what he saw: a future where millions of developers could be “liberated” to spend their time on their most fulfilling work.

name: Cisco
description: Cisco was one of the first companies to sell commercially successful routers for multiple network protocols. Today Cisco connects people, data and processes through its cloud-computing applications and services. Its hardware, software and services create the internet solutions that make networks possible.

name: Moovit
description: Moovit is a Mobility as a Service (MaaS) solutions provider and creator of the popular urban mobility app. In 2020, Moovit was acquired by Intel to join forces with Mobileye and accelerate the adoption of autonomous transportation. Moovit’s urban mobility app has guided more than 1.5 billion users in more than 3,500 across 112 countries in getting around town, using any mode of transport. For governments, cities, and transit agencies, Moovit offers AI-powered MaaS solutions covering planning, operations, and optimization with proven value in reducing congestion, growing ridership, and increasing efficiency.

name: Captions
description: Captions is an AI-powered creative studio. Their goal is to enable anyone, anywhere to produce studio-quality videos with just a few quick taps.

name: Factory
description: Factory is bringing autonomy to software engineering. Factory’s Droids robustly, reliably, and autonomously solve engineering tasks, like code review, documentation, testing, debugging, coding, and project management.

name: Tanda
description: Tanda is a community-driven savings service dedicated to improving financial well-being for all. It empowers users to pursue financial goals by building a community of mutual support.

name: Zafran
description: Zafran is a threat exposure management platform that integrates with security tools to reveal, remediate and mitigate all infrastructure risks. Its agentless approach reveals what is truly exploitable, while reducing manual effort.

name: Skild AI
description: Skild AI is building a scalable AI foundation model for robotics to unlock intelligence in the embodied, physical world. This general-purpose model will enable the use of low-cost robots across a broad range of industries and applications.

name: Quantum Circuits
description: Quantum Circuits is reimagining the full stack of quantum computation to offer a scalable platform that tackles the world’s most challenging problems in everything from pharma and finance to machine learning and AI. Its machines use quantum phenomena, such as superposition and entanglement, to exponentially scale computational power.

name: Airtop
description: Airtop (fka Switchboard) provides intelligent browser automation for AI agents, enabling seamless web interaction with any site, even those requiring complex authentication processes. Airtop simplifies the development and deployment of AI-powered agents, making it an essential tool for AI-driven projects that require dynamic web interaction.

name: Otto Finance
description: Otto is transforming wealth management by automating key advisory workflows with AI, freeing wealth managers from outdated systems and processes. Its orchestration platform enhances efficiency, enabling advisers to serve more clients with precision. Otto streamlines & automates client onboarding, servicing, reporting, and communication, generating content and highlighting key actions. The platform also elevates the client experience through a next-gen portal, delivering scalable, personalised service seamlessly integrated into the adviser’s workflow.

name: Observable
description: Observable is a web-based platform that brings data, context and logic together in one place. With no environments to set up, users can share, collaborate and iterate, right in the browser. It facilitates collaborative business intelligence work and accelerates data-driven insights and decision-making.

name: Robust Intelligence
description: Robust Intelligence, now a part of Cisco, builds products that integrate seamlessly into the AI-development life cycle to ensure robustness and reliability. Founded by academics at Harvard in 2019, Robust Intelligence’s platform eliminates the risks inherent in AI systems.

name: Cortex
description: Cortex helps engineering teams improve their service-oriented architecture. It catalogs their services and reveals their performance in terms of quality initiatives, security audits and other tasks.

name: Grafana
description: Grafana is open-source technology for dashboards and visualization. It provides an open and composable observability platform.

name: Eon
description: Eon transforms your cloud backups into an accessible, useful asset. Use Eon to back up your entire cloud environment with automatic mapping and classification, so you only store what you need. Nothing more, nothing less.

name: Safe Superintelligence
description: The world’s first straight-shot SSI lab, with one goal and one product: a safe superintelligence.

name: QueryPal
description: QueryPal, formerly CtrlStack, transforms your support operations by slashing ticket response times.

name: LiquidMetal AI
description: LiquidMetal AI (fka Seaplane) builds your AI infused application on top of the worldclass Cloudflare infrastructure.

name: Cove
description: Cove is an AI-assisted workspace that helps you get more done.

name: Pharming Group
description: A global biopharmaceutical company developing and commercializing innovative protein replacement therapies and precision medicines to serve the unserved rare disease patient.

name: Microchip Technology
description: Microchip Technology is a leading provider of smart, connected and secure embedded control and processing solutions.

name: Flextronics
description: Flextronics is the manufacturing partner of choice that helps a diverse customer base design and build products that improve the world.

name: CafePress
description: CafePress works with designers to bring the world millions of designs on hundreds of different products.

name: LSI Logic
description: LSI Logic Corporation was a pioneer in the ASIC and EDA industries. It evolved over time to design and sell semiconductors and software that accelerated storage and networking in data centers, mobile networks and client computing.

name: Omnicell
description: Omnicell manufactures automated systems for medication management in hospitals and other healthcare settings, and medication adherence packaging and patient engagement software used by retail pharmacies.

name: Quince Therapeutics
description: Quince Therapeutics (fka Cortexyme) is a late-stage biotechnology company dedicated to unlocking the power of a patient’s own biology for the treatment of rare diseases.

name: Health Catalyst
description: Health Catalyst is a leading provider of data and analytics technology and services to healthcare organizations, committed to being the catalyst for massive, measurable, data-informed healthcare improvement.

name: Cadence Design Systems
description: Cadence is a leader in electronic systems design, building upon more than 30 years of computational software expertise. The company applies its underlying Intelligent System Design strategy to deliver software, hardware, and IP that turn design concepts into reality.

name: Rackspace
description: Rackspace offers hybrid multicloud solutions, including applications, data, security and AI, across every industry.

name: Getir
description: Getir revolutionizes last-mile delivery with its grocery delivery proposition. Getir delivers a selection of 1,500 everyday items wherever its customers wish within minutes, seven days a week, day and night. Getir, which launched in London in January 2021, also owns sub-brands GetirFood, GetirMore and GetirWater.

name: Catch
description: Catch helps merchants and their customers save by cutting out the credit card companies. By paying directly by bank, customers save merchants on payment processing fees. Merchants pass those savings back to the customer as store credit and drive retention. Everyone wins—except the card companies.

name: Odoo
description: Odoo is a leading integrated business solutions provider. It offers a comprehensive, modular suite of scalable apps that meets the specific needs of every business, making it a suitable solution for organizations of all sizes and sectors, from start-ups to large corporations.

name: Release
description: Release provides ephemeral environments as a service. Its platform enables the creation of a precise replica of the production environment that can be used for verifying new features, quality assurance, load testing and staging.

name: Roon
description: Roon was founded by an interdisciplinary team of scientists, doctors, patients, caregivers, designers, engineers, product managers and content producers. We aspire to be the place where all people experiencing challenging health conditions go to find information, community and support. We build products that re-imagine medical content and health communities today.

name: AMP Robotics
description: AMP Robotics is changing the face of recycling with high-speed guided robotics. Powered by advanced computer vision and machine learning, the company’s robotics system automates the identification, sorting and processing done by recycling businesses.

name: Xaira
description: Xaira is reinventing drug R&D using artificial intelligence to rapidly prototype and test antibody and small molecule treatments for diseases with well-understood biological validation.

name: Rox
description: Rox helps businesses secure and grow revenue. The best enterprise teams get better with Rox agent swarms aggregating and analyzing data, and delivering actionable next steps for each account.

name: Stainless
description: Stainless helps API providers easily create high-quality SDKs to drive faster integration, broader feature adoption, quicker upgrades and build trust in engineering quality.

name: Bigeye
description: Bigeye is the leading data quality engineering platform. It combines automatic instrumentation, robust anomaly detection, and extensive customization to give insight on each piece of data.

name: Curie
description: Curie is a voice-driven AI assistant for clinicians.

name: Sunday
description: Sunday is a subscription service that provides nutrient and soil health plans for gardens and lawns. It uses climate, soil and satellite data to deliver gardening and lawn maintenance-related products and services.

name: Domino Data Lab
description: Domino Data Lab’s platforms help data scientists build and deploy AI applications. Its tool not only trains models, but monitors performance once they’ve gone live.

name: nsave
description: nsave offers trusted offshore USD, EUR and GBP accounts for people from countries with unstable economies and high inflation. Its user-friendly app democratizes financial services and empowers the financially underserved to protect and grow their wealth.

name: Gridware
description: Gridware provides wireless realtime instrumentation for utilities managing the power grid. Its system allows utilities to detect faults, expedite outage repairs and manage the long-term health of their assets.

name: Phantom
description: Phantom is the leading non-custodial crypto wallet, designed for mass adoption.

name: EDX Markets
description: EDX Markets is a new digital asset exchange designed to meet the needs of both crypto-native firms and the world’s largest financial institutions. EDX will enable safer, faster and more efficient trading of digital assets, leveraging best practices from traditional financial markets on a purpose-built crypto platform.

name: Nubank
description: Nubank is the leading financial technology company in Latin America and the largest independent neobank worldwide, with more than 20 million clients. Initially a no-fee credit card managed by a mobile app, Nubank has since expanded to include a proprietary loyalty rewards program, digital account and personal loans.
why_partnered: David had an idea to serve a large, underserved group of customers in the financial services market in Brazil. It had the potential to be a big opportunity if tackled right. His vision combined with astonishing executional zeal and digital design prowess quickly made us believers in Nubank’s ability to transform banking.

name: Dropbox
description: Dropbox is a collaboration and storage platform transforming the way people and teams work together.

name: Robinhood
description: Robinhood is democratizing finance for all by allowing anyone to invest in stocks, ETFs, options and cryptocurrencies commission-free.

name: YouTube
description: YouTube is the world’s leading video-sharing service. It makes uploading and sharing videos with family, friends and the entire world effortless. It was acquired by Google and is the web’s second most visited website.
why_partnered: It was 2005. User-generated content and online advertising were taking off. Video was the natural next space in this content evolution. Chad, Steve and Jawed were scrappy, smart and had built an easy-to-use product we believed in. YouTube’s goal was clear from the outset—become the primary destination for user-generated video content on the web.

name: Natera
description: Natera is a global leader in DNA testing. It is changing disease management across a number of clinical areas, including oncology and women’s health, thanks to its cell-free DNA (cfDNA) technology platform approach.

name: DoorDash
description: DoorDash is a technology and logistics company that started with on-demand door-to-door delivery. It empowers local businesses to connect with people through their platform of diners and dashers.
why_partnered: We sat next to Tony at a dinner one night and were amazed by how deeply he understood the logistical challenges of restaurant service. His methodical mindset, and grasp of complex, multi-sided marketplaces combined with a missionary zeal to serve local merchants convinced us that DoorDash was going to upend the last-mile logistics industry. Starting with the most complicated local businesses, restaurants in suburban America, highlighted the company’s determination and ability to carve out a marketing wedge in a highly competitive market.

name: UiPath
description: UiPath offers an end-to-end platform for automation, combining the leading Robotic Process Automation (RPA) solution with a full suite of capabilities like AI, process mining and the cloud, so every organization can rapidly scale their digital operations.

name: reddit
description: Reddit is the internet’s leading source of interest-based content. Subreddits devoted to every imaginable topic form a network of highly-specific, community curated information.

name: ServiceNow
description: ServiceNow is a digital workflow engine that increases productivity by simplifying work. Its suite of products make it easy to predict, prioritize and proactively manage work.

name: HubSpot
description: HubSpot does away with the needle-in-the-haystack approach to targeting consumers, allowing companies to manage marketing tools with one system. HubSpot offers training, analytics and advice to help companies master social media, use search engines and manage content aimed at the next generation of customers.

name: Block
description: Block is Square, Cash App, Spiral, TIDAL, TBD, and other foundational teams. It is one company built from many blocks, all united by the same purpose of economic empowerment.
why_partnered: Bootstrapped by Jack, Square (now Block) had a vision to allow anyone with an iPhone to become a merchant. Part hardware, part app, the mobile payments product was originally called Squirrel because of its resemblance to an acorn. A demo in which we saw Square in action (and in which we were charged $3.00) gave us a glimpse into the platform’s transformative power.

name: Airbnb
description: Airbnb brought consumers into the sharing economy with its revolutionary peer-to-peer travel marketplace. Today the company connects people around the world with its unique homes and unforgettable experiences.
why_partnered: Brian, Joe and Nate had a clear vision to disrupt a fragmented vacation rental market. The frustration of trying to book hotels during convention peaks was just the hook. They drew us in further with their scrappiness, imagination and storytelling. If everything went right, Airbnb saw an opportunity to redefine the large, global and enduring travel market.

name: PayPal
description: For more than 20 years, PayPal has remained at the forefront of the digital payment revolution, growing into a two-sided network that connects merchants and consumers in more than 200 markets worldwide.

name: Kumo
description: Kumo is a SaaS AI platform for the modern data stack that allows businesses to make faster, simpler, and smarter predictions. Founded by several pre-eminent AI executives from companies like Pinterest, Airbnb, and LinkedIn, the core technology that underpins Kumo’s product has been in development for the past five years through Stanford/Dortmund labs and PyG open-source software. Kumo makes graph learning easy to use – so any business can leverage the power of graph-based AI to better their business.

name: XBOW
description: XBOW is an AI-powered offensive security company that automates pentesting and accelerates the discovery of vulnerabilities and exploits in all types of software.

name: Decart
description: The Decart efficient AI platform provides an order of magnitude improvement in both training and inferencing of the largest generative models. Leveraging these advanced capabilities, Decart is able to train foundational generative interactive models and make it accessible for everyone in real-time.

name: Glean
description: Glean is the work assistant with intuition. It brings all your company’s knowledge together, so you can search for exactly what you need and discover the things you should know. Glean searches across all your company’s apps, using its understanding of who you are, what you’re working on, and who you’re working with, to deliver highly personalized results, instantly. It surfaces knowledge and makes connections with the people who can help—making it easier for you and your team to get big things done.

name: Harmonic
description: Harmonic is building a state-of-the-art mathematical reasoning engine in pursuit of mathematical superintelligence. It aims to change the way math is taught, build truthful AI and verify software for safety-critical domains.

name: GitHub
description: GitHub is the system of record for code, now part of Microsoft. Through its passionate community developers discover and build millions of projects assisted by AI.

name: VEED
description: VEED is a browser-based, collaborative and easy-to-use video creation and editing tool. The product has millions of monthly active users all over the world and with different video editing skills, ranging from prosumers to SMEs and users in the enterprise. Use cases are broad from social media videos, to marketing, sales, HR, training videos, internal communication, etc.

name: Vanta
description: Vanta automates and simplifies the complex, time-consuming and tedious process of becoming SOC 2-, HIPAA- or ISO 27001-compliant. It integrates and monitors tools and infrastructure, creates to-do lists for gaps, summarizes results, and connects users with a trained auditor.
why_partnered: Christina was a one-of-a-kind CEO building a category-defining company. Vanta had a sharp wedge into the security and compliance market, delivering the fastest and easiest way for companies to get SOC 2 compliant. The business traction and product strength was strong. That along with Christina’s vision for Vanta’s future made us true believers.

name: Robco
description: Robco radically rethinks how products are made, using modular robot systems. From the phones in our pockets, to the rockets launching us to space, physical products are mainly made in a manual, strenuous, repetitive way — at industrial SMBs. Improving the industrial SMB status quo is arguably one of the most impactful global opportunities to ensure sustainability and long-term economic success. Robco does so with its innovative modular robotics platform for industrial use cases.

name: Pennylane
description: Pennylane is a full-stack financial management platform connecting all financial data for business owners and their CPAs. It offers a full and detailed overview that helps business owners make smarter decisions and manage their finances.

name: Lemni
description: Lemni is a plug-and-play environment for custom AI agents that deliver personal customer interactions at scale. Its no-code interface enables teams to set up and deploy agents in minutes. Lemni provides the tools, guardrails and business intelligence they need to deliver exceptional customer experiences.

name: Draftea
description: Draftea is the premier real-money gaming platform in the Spanish-speaking world. Sports fans can easily place bets on their favorite teams, players and matches while enjoying an engaging live experience that brings the action closer than ever.

name: Peregrine
description: Peregrine creates software that helps organizations integrate and analyze large and complex data stores to create intelligence and inform enterprise decision making. Their technology is used by government and commercial organizations for crime reduction, disaster management, fraud detection, health service delivery and more.

name: Freed
description: Freed is an AI clinician assistant that automates visit preparation, documentation, EHR interactions and other burdensome clinical tasks. Freed is tackling the crisis of clinician burnout by giving clinicians valuable time back in their day.

name: Claim
description: Claim is building a new way for friends to connect and for brands to reward their customers. On Claim, friends earn cash back, exchange rewards, and redeem together by shopping at their favorite brands. The result is a social network that focuses on real-world value, authenticity, and communal experience — rather than manufactured content and reposts. Consumers discover brands on Claim via rewards from friends. For high-growth brands, this word-of-mouth matching creates the perfect introduction to a new customer — a reward from a friend is always better than an ad from an influencer.

name: Pydantic
description: Pydantic is an AI agent framework and LLM observability solution.

name: Uber
description: Uber is an on-demand ride-hailing and delivery service. Its three-sided marketplace connects consumers, drivers and merchants.

name: Humble Bundle

It uses one API connector per cloud and the Kubernetes environment to scan every cloud resource. Wiz also identifies combinations that make clouds susceptible to a breach.

name: MyOme

name: Bunkerhill Health

Its platform scans medical images and EHRs, flags patients for follow-up, and automates care coordination. Bunkerhill improves outcomes, streamlines workflows, and boosts revenue—without adding work for clinicians.

name: Supernova

name: xAI

name: WireScreen

name: Despegar

name: Pixelworks

name: Quantenna

name: QuickLogic
description: QuickLogic is the leading provider of open reconfigurable computing solutions based on 100% open source software and hardware.

name: Ruckus Networks
description: Ruckus Networks builds award-winning routing and switching products to deliver information quickly and reliably. It is a pioneer in the wireless infrastructure market for high bandwidth applications and services. Ruckus Networks is now part of CommScope.

name: Western Digital
description: Western Digital is an integrated circuit and data memory technology developer. It is one of the world’s largest computer hard disk drive (HDD) manufacturers, along with producing solid-state drives (SSDs) and flash memory devices.

name: Synativ
description: Synativ develops geospatial AI agents that help companies speed up data formatting and transformations. Its platform allows individuals to create AI-powered data pipelines to get analysis-ready-data in minutes instead of weeks, performing operations that would typically require highly skilled data engineering teams.

name: Finch
description: Finch is a modern pre-litigation platform built for personal injury law firms, combining elite paralegals and advanced AI agents to handle administrative work. By solving for intake, case management, and demand drafting, Finch enables plaintiff firms to serve more clients while providing a high quality client experience and reducing the access to justice gap in the U.S.

name: Dagster
description: Dagster is a data orchestration platform for the development, production and observation of data assets.

name: Salt Security
